![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/xsRATdtDGIdlDcyY8zcP0ho7Hvea4AX4XYM2vF3V.jpg&w=3840&q=80)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/S17jRPrxGx07uLJ7zaY6fVMMOoIOCYHFhDshL7R4.jpg&w=3840&q=80)

## 

Overview of ACB

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /About us

## 

Asia Commercial Joint Stock Bank (ACB)

ACB is one of the leading joint stock commercial banks in Vietnam, with a network of branches and transaction offices spanning 49 provinces out of 63 in the country and has more than 13,000 employees, with many variety of products and services.

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/eppLc3Uq8UbnEwQ8LrXNyc6vrQKw2Xi3pMidejOM.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

[See more](https://acb.com.vn/en/overview)

## 

Chairman’s message, vision and mission

## Chairman’s message

Direct the shift in mindset and raising the awareness of application of technology to improve and develop work. The digitization of processes (digitalization) is the responsibility of the dedicated units as well as all the internal entities in performing their functions and duties.

[See details](https://acb.com.vn/en/chairmans-message)

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/xzyrJIzsv8ak9tyGLZIxx6Jb9Rq7QP7cdGvi5hMh.jpg&w=3840&q=75)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/74pBf6qh9iAq8aB8MXE0LqdeoWRSyrx1zQQ6bg7w.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/T0awj9S4BUWZMe2gZCz48qpwcUvBPdNV9pPFR2Id.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## Vision

To grow and develop our business in a sustainable way and with a transformation mindset to stay competitive.

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/eN6xmcpDftnDsjDK7VPwU7jg9kvRBar3Zm70234A.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## Mission

To deliver best customer experience, generate high revenues, and attain an ROE of 20% p.a.

## 

Five core values

01.

### Integrity

We uphold integrity, address issues in a straightforward and transparent manner, and adopt no tolerance policy to untruthfulness.

02.

### Prudence

We advocate compliance with laws and regulations as well as internal rules, and manage risks and returns in decision making.

03.

### Innovation

We are eager to learn, adapt to the ever-changing operating conditions, and support changes.

04.

### Harmonization of interests

We, being as a service provider, a partner and a corporate citizen, respect the interests of our relevant parties.

05.

### Effectiveness

We act to produce a better result, to deliver more value or to use the least waste of time, effort, and resources.

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/leadership2.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## Leadership

Board of Directors: 9 members, of which 2 are executives, Supervisory Board: 3 members; the Management: 9 senior officers and 1 chief accountant.

[

Read more

](https://acb.com.vn/en/leadership)

## 

Achievements

Awards, latest notable events of ACB

## Network

As of December 31, 2022, ACB has 90 branches and 294 sub-branches (totaling 384), present in 49 out of 63 cities and provinces nationwide. A majority of offices are located in Ho Chi Minh City and Ha Noi City.

49

#### Provinces and Cities

## 

Press Release

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/H%C3%ACnh%20t%C3%B2a%20nh%C3%A0%20ACB.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/about-us/fitch-upgrades-acbs-government-support-rating-to-bb)

[

#### FITCH UPGRADES ACB’S GOVERNMENT SUPPORT RATING TO 'BB-'

](https://acb.com.vn/en/about-us/fitch-upgrades-acbs-government-support-rating-to-bb)

\-22/12/2023

On December 08, 2023, Fitch, one of the three biggest rating agencies in the world, upgraded Asia Commercial Joint Stock Bank's (ACB) Government Support Rating (GSR) to 'bb-' from 'b+'. The rating action reflects the agency’s view of the state's improving ability to support the bank, in times of need.

Press Release
FITCH UPGRADES ACB’S GOVERNMENT SUPPORT RATING TO 'BB-'
-22/12/2023
On December 08, 2023, Fitch, one of the three biggest rating agencies in the world, upgraded Asia Commercial Joint Stock Bank's (ACB) Government Support Rating (GSR) to 'bb-' from 'b+'. The rating action reflects the agency’s view of the state's improving ability to support the bank, in times of need.

markdown:
## 

Frequently Asked Questions

Do I need to register for ACB Rewards?

Customers do not need to register when participating in ACB Rewards, customers are automatically registered for ACB Rewards points account when bonus points are generated.

What products do ACB Rewards point products include?

![](data:image/png;base64,)

In which section do I need to look up my existing ACB Rewards points?

Please log in to the ACB ONE application, at the ACB Rewards section, select "Bonus Points" to see the following information: Available Rewards Points, Expired Rewards Points, Point History, Unavailable Points use

How long can I receive gifts after redeeming presents?

For gifts that are evouchers, you will receive them immediately after successful redemption on the system. Please check the “My Gifts” section of the ACB Rewards page on the ACB ONE app

How to redeem ACB Rewards?

Please log in to the ACB ONE application, at the ACB Rewards section, select "Rewards" and click "Redeem"

## Online loan

###### Step 1

First, you must present your I.D. card or passport to ACB’s office.

###### Step 2

You make a request for online loan. Then ACB’s staff will ask for your name and I.D. card or passport.

###### Step 3

You are instructed to download ACB Mobile Banking application and provided with username and sent a password to your mobile number.

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/zbiZR0cE49bb47OtpcmhrPzqoyoeysFhgIQRr0nC.jpg&w=2048&q=75)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/ZcLDVNk0PlfQy8HKebCRlbPtghp9sWrXvQusjP9L.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/uu-dai/uu-dai-bao-hiem)

## Giới thiệu

Từ năm 2020 đến nay, Sun Life Việt Nam đã thành công ký xác nhận thỏa thuận hợp tác phân phối độc quyền các sản phẩm bảo hiểm nhân thọ qua kênh Bancassurance với Ngân hàng TMCP Á Châu (ACB). Mô hình hợp tác trên giúp kết hợp các thế mạnh về sản phẩm cũng như năng lực tài chính của Sun Life và đối tác, mang đến những giải pháp tài chính linh hoạt, phù hợp với các nhu cầu của Khách hàng trên hành trình xây dựng tương lai vững vàng, tươi sáng.

[

Read more

](https://acb.com.vn/en/thu-vien/acb-x-sun-life-su-cong-huong-hai-hoa-sau-hai-nam-hop-tac)

## 

Các sản phẩm bảo hiểm

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/qmKOpDvozm6bkStKY7MXhD2g86SSXBOpmpmgBcXw.jpg/qmKOpDvozm6bkStKY7MXhD2g86SSXBOpmpmgBcXw.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect/sun-new-life-savings-insurance)

[

#### SUN – NEW LIFE SAVINGS INSURANCE

](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect/sun-new-life-savings-insurance)

SUN – New Life is an insurance solution with pioneering benefits in terms of protection and attractive assets accumulation to bring differentiating experiences for a life full of love.

[See details](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect/sun-new-life-savings-insurance)

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/rlZdpJlA8qjIOn4VOjRbkIw7uO415VP2Vu0mQbDa.png/rlZdpJlA8qjIOn4VOjRbkIw7uO415VP2Vu0mQbDa.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect/sun-bright-living-investment-insurance)

[

#### SUN – Bright Living Investment Insurance

](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect/sun-bright-living-investment-insurance)

SUN: BRIGHT LIVING: Light up tomorrow. Are you planning a brighter future for yourself and your family? SUN - Bright Living is a combination of insurance solution and smart investment which enables you to savor life.

[See details](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect/sun-bright-living-investment-insurance)

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/Xy5JGVmM4s6cSeZJa3U0CFgh7IaxTL95EqQPTzsl.png/Xy5JGVmM4s6cSeZJa3U0CFgh7IaxTL95EqQPTzsl.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect/acb-medical-care)

[

#### ACB Medical Care

](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect/acb-medical-care)

Hospital expense is covered; cash payment is not required at health facilities partnered with Bao Viet Insurance Company.

[See details](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect/acb-medical-care)

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/6W6HLaYqo1g8PLXIQISKQnuQINc3h6hKPbWvgmK8.jpg/6W6HLaYqo1g8PLXIQISKQnuQINc3h6hKPbWvgmK8.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect/additional-insurance-tu-ky)

[

#### Additional Insurance - Tử Kỳ

](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect/additional-insurance-tu-ky)

The solution extends financial protection against the risks of death or total and permanent disability. Actively plan financial protection for yourself and your family against the risk of death or injury with the Lifetime supplementary insurance product.

[See details](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect/additional-insurance-tu-ky)

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)

## 

Payment services

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/tT9U2J3Y98DNOtoZ5FvajAGBGV3kjXvDhf7h2yEm.jpg&w=3840&q=75)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/qLB2KLAUAp6n0SplZDUPmPxNaDsuaUC8pVWGzuNx.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en)

## 

List of services

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/_next/static/media/notFound.c16f4396.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/utilities-payment-service)

[

#### Utilities payment service

](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/utilities-payment-service)

Payment of electricity, water, and telephone bills by the business shall be recognized and debited automatically and quickly by the service supplier.

[See details](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/utilities-payment-service)

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/_next/static/media/notFound.c16f4396.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/domestic-tax-payment-on-etax)

[

#### Domestic tax payment on Etax

](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/domestic-tax-payment-on-etax)

Corporates can make payments for Value-added tax, License Tax, Income Tax, etc. directly on website of the Tax Authority when having an ACB payment account.

[See details](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/domestic-tax-payment-on-etax)

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/_next/static/media/notFound.c16f4396.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/collection-service)

[

#### Collection service

](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/collection-service)

A service provided to businesses wishing to quickly and accurately collect money from buyers through ACB's collection channels.

[See details](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/collection-service)

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/_next/static/media/notFound.c16f4396.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/payment-on-behalf-service)

[

#### Payment on Behalf Service

](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/payment-on-behalf-service)

A service provided to businesses with a need to debit money from their accounts for payment to designated beneficiaries quickly, accurately, and safely.

[See details](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/payment-on-behalf-service)

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/_next/static/media/notFound.c16f4396.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/electronically-signed-transactions)

[

#### Electronically signed transactions

](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/electronically-signed-transactions)

A banking service allowing transactions via email with the required documents signed electronically. ACB will perform the transaction for businesses rather than the businesses go to the counter to perform the transaction as in the traditional way.

[See details](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/electronically-signed-transactions)

## 

Others

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/_next/static/media/notFound.c16f4396.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/centralized-account-management)

[

#### Centralized account management

](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/centralized-account-management)

A service that provides the feature of capital concentration or capital allocation between a main account and multiple sub-accounts, helping businesses to concentrate or allocate capital efficiently and automatically.

[See details](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/centralized-account-management)

[![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/_next/static/media/notFound.c16f4396.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/custody-service)

[

#### Custody Service

](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/custody-service)

Is a service that ACB receives and preserves valuable papers and documents for businesses to ensure the safety and confidentiality of information.

[See details](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service/custody-service)

## 

ACB ONE

Secure finance – Less worry, more happy

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /Digital Bank

## For individual customers

ACB ONE is a mobile banking application enabling customers to make convenient, easy and safe transactions.

[

Check it out!

](https://acb.com.vn/en/ngan-hang-so/3-buoc-kham-pha-acb)

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/SWmBrfZyZtN7qUhBm6vRWmnuliRZEzdSTJif0DzI.png&w=384&q=75)

###### Get 2% cashback

2% cashback will be applied directly on the amount you select for prepaid mobile top-up on ACB ONE

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/ZBQNmETWUXhApLxY2uUJg3oRuRCLN8tTQt9SpEgP.png&w=384&q=75)

###### Opening a trio of Account - Debit card - ACB ONE application

Promotions throughout the year

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/CUDiMJQkt3tUl9zPrWVgZnYAvi82x50Stp6MfcSk.png&w=384&q=75)

###### Additional interest rate of 0,5% p.a.

Applicable to online savings on ACB ONE

## Let’s find out interesting features of ACB ONE

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/fs0Iaqbm7NqUeHgRK7D5NMxKKCbV8W3AbsrNTn24.jpg&w=640&q=75)

###### ACB SAFEKEY

Free OTP verification on ACB ONE.

*   OTP is automatically filled, no need to remember the code or copy it.
    
*   Secure transactions, minimize risks
    
*   Receive OTP even when transacting abroad.
    
*   Unlimited online transaction limit (\*)
    
    (\*) Visit ACB branch/sub-branch to upgrade to your limit if you have not registered for Advanced Safekey before.
    

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/AyDiYJe5bFN6KqJZ5LrIlOovs8NuPH90eBxVxF6o.jpg&w=640&q=75)

###### VIDEO CALL

Face Identity for quick account upgrades through free calls on ACB ONE

*   Optimize the experience with fully digitalized transactions.
    
*   Information security and fraud prevention.
    
*   Online transaction anytime, anywhere via the ACB ONE.
    

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/foJjVO64II3AsRWtaRyPgsJpqYCp8ZslDufbIq3N.jpg&w=640&q=75)

###### PAYMENT – TRANSFER – WITHDRAWAL - DEPOSIT WITH QR CODE

Fast and convenient transaction;

*   Simple and time-saving;
    
*   Secure and safe;
    
*   Easy transactions with a Smartphone, no physical card required.
    

## Offers

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/pVJ8nORCKfENBklwR1MYPySPEd1SZ9v7h2vBi6Rp.jpg&w=2048&q=75)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/nLGrIPRvb6RFtNk88Mpr5SYilxe9BjooXR5XL2bd.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## For SME

ACB ONE BIZ is an electronic banking service that provides digitization features to help businesses save costs and manage all transactions.

[

More support

](https://motaikhoandoanhnghiep.acb.com.vn/)

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/nDjzJSppotvsI0ynXogFP46JKdu8AlZKUJheKhaz.png&w=384&q=75)

###### 0 Fee

Applicable to any online transactions on ACB ONE BIZ

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/OsQwOcW0wlW4zV8eghpHDOuG80Q954SEZXYyKnlu.png&w=384&q=75)

###### 100% Online disbursement

Request and confirm disbursement via ACB ONE BIZ

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/TVy0XSOC6VPxU09rIEiafAyTBNJlkNVqpa106FSt.png&w=384&q=75)

###### 24/7 banking transaction

Multi-channel transaction anytime, anywhere (on website and via phone)

## Offers

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/PC_Thanh%20toan%20song%20phuong_1140x488_EN.jpg&w=2048&q=75)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/Mobile_Thanh%20toan%20song%20phuong_326x440_EN.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## For corporations

ACB ONE PRO is an e-banking service with in-depth and flexible features to meet the diverse needs of large-scale businesses.

[

More support

](https://motaikhoandoanhnghiep.acb.com.vn/)

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/iPvb9b2UrHLl4WQZUGGjivLfwCSv90sFyzFrjCMg.png&w=384&q=75)

###### Flexible assignment of authority

With various criteria of your choice, from simple to complex.

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/5b7dfsZUhGxoRwzt9RZEqPgaxXiYgnJYFXkZgGfe.png&w=384&q=75)

###### Confidential payroll service

Option to obscure employee salary when approving orders.

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/nTQSAzWYXqzZ02P3KTPPM3Bx1zs97lsYcZPUyJuQ.png&w=384&q=75)

###### 24/7 purchase and sale of foreign currencies

Place and approve orders anytime, anywhere, regardless of the Bank's opening hours.

## System connection and integration

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/qGl951BMVOQuHIsKGoFuN0xUNVSFMCZnMtc7P1FV.png&w=640&q=75)

##### Open an online account (eKYC)

Open an online account (eKYC) at ACB on the partner's website or application. After completing the authentication and identification steps, clients are granted an ACB online account and can make transactions right on ACB ONE.

[

More

](https://acb.com.vn/en/coming-soon)

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/ob3xSEAOcBueUHqs6LWW6hHBFTntZ6e9STDozsYJ.png&w=640&q=75)

##### Collections

Pay and receive money quickly through the bank's channels for collections service. Ensure to fully record corporate clients' information, receive notifications as soon as money arrives, easily track cash flow, issue invoices, etc.

[

More

](https://acb.com.vn/en/coming-soon)

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/5Vv2p6zOYDFTmPeqskzY05FzXEjdb2dlMF8utZOT.png&w=640&q=75)

##### Payment solution

The solution to help businesses pay money to partners with the following advantages: automatic cost management, reduced risk when counting and paying in cash, secure and time-saving for partners, etc.

[

More

](https://acb.com.vn/en/coming-soon)

![image](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/FknsLsPdJqw95XNFRIF23OKBPmK6bR9F7Hay8pgq.png&w=640&q=75)

##### E-wallet

Link your ACB account with e-wallets quickly and safely. Users can place money from their ACB account into an e-wallet, withdraw money when in need, and enjoy multiple payment offers from partners.

[

More

](https://acb.com.vn/en/coming-soon)

## Our main partners

markdown:
## 

Question List

Customers who do not have an account at ACB can use SMS Banking?

Customers who do not have an account at ACB can use SMS Banking service to view exchange rates.

On ACB ONE service, what operations can customers perform?

**On ACB ONE service, you can perform the following services:**

Look up transaction information on the account

Look up information on exchange rates, interest rates, and fee schedules

Transfer within or outside the ACB system

Transfer money to recipient with ID card

Input money to card

Pay the bill

Change foreign currency

Open an online investment account

Open a term deposit account

Look up card usage information

...

What are the benefits of using ACB ONE service?

With Internet Banking, you can perform common transactions anywhere, anytime, just connect to the Internet, no need to go directly to ACB's branch/transaction office during service hours.

Transfer to any bank in the country

Transfer money to recipients by card, ID card

Convert all foreign currencies from foreign currency payment deposit account to VND payment deposit account in ACB system

Pay bills

Create an online investment account, a term deposit account with attractive interest rates

Borrow money online with a term deposit account balance

Look up all account information (see balance, list transactions)

Save time and travel costs

Free tally

What is ACB ONE service?

ACB ONE is a service that helps customers with VND payment deposit accounts at ACB make transactions with ACB anytime, anywhere through devices that are desktop computers or laptops with Internet connection.

How many types of ACB credit cards and credit limit of each type?

ACB credit cards include 6 types and corresponding credit limits are:

*   Student card: from 3 million to 6 million VND
*   Standard card: from 10 million to 50 million VND
*   Yellow card: from 30 million to 500 million VND
*   Visa Platinum card: from 100 million VND or more
*   World MasterCard: from 200 million VND or more
*   Visa Business Card: from 10 million to 200 million VND

How is the credit limit applied to Primary Cardholder and Supplementary Cardholder?

The primary cardholder and the supplementary cardholder share the same limit granted to the primary cardholder by the Bank.

Is it necessary to issue a supplementary credit card with proof of income?

Are not. According to ACB's regulations, supplementary cardholders do not need to prove their income.

How is the annual fee calculated for the main card and the credit card supplementary card?

Supplementary card annual fee is equal to 50% of main card annual fee and ACB will collect annual fee to card account.

When my credit card expires, what should I do?

ACB will send a letter and message/Email to notify you of card renewal. You can contact the nearest ACB branch for instructions on adding card renewal documents.

See more

markdown:
## History

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/s6s3zzc967ZprvTCuwlV8tOvriCKkwipoEDVmGrN.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

Establishment date

## June 04, 1993

ACB started operations on June 04, 1993.

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/s6s3zzc967ZprvTCuwlV8tOvriCKkwipoEDVmGrN.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

Listing time

## November 21, 2006

ACB listed on Hanoi Securities Trading Center (now re-named as Hanoi Stock Exchange – HNX) pursuant to Decision No. 21/QĐ-TTGDHN dated October 31, 2006. The first transaction date was November 21, 2006. ACB listed on Hochiminh Stock Exchange (HOSE) pursuant to Decision No. 573/QĐ-SGDHCM dated November 20, 2020.

1993 - 1995

Embryonic stage of development.

The founders shared the common business principle of “managing the development of the enterprise in a safe and effective way.”

Targeted segments included households and private SMEs.

1996 - 2000

Became the first private Vietnamese bank to issue the international credit cards (MasterCard and Visa).

Approach modern banking services and products.

Launched an IT modernization program.

Rearranged the organizational structure of Headquarters in order to facilitate business and support activities.

Established ACB Securities Company (ACBS).

2001 - 2005

Adopted the ISO 9001:2000 quality management system and registered for recognition of (i) deposit taking, (ii) short and long-term lending, (iii) trade services, and (iv) human resource processes at the Headquarters.

Standard Chartered Bank (SCB) signed an agreement to provide ACB with comprehensive technical assistance, and became an ACB shareholder.

Carried out the second phase of the IT modernization program.

2006 - 2010

Listed on the Hanoi Stock Exchange.

Rapid expansion of the branch network: 223 offices were put into operation, a leap from 58 offices in 2005 to 281 offices in 2010.

Established ACB Leasing (ACBL).

Issued 10 million shares with par value of VND100 billion, with the proceeds of more  
than VND1,800 billion (2007); and increased its chartered capital to VND6,355 billion (2008).

Built a standard data backup center in Dong Nai Province.

Awarded two Labor Medals by the Government, and recognized by various prestigious financial magazines and organizations as the best bank in Vietnam.

2011

The “Strategic Directions for 2011 to 2015 and the Vision to 2020” was issued.   
An enterprise module data center was put into operation.

ACB Gold Manufacturing Center was the first business in the industry certified by

QMS Australia for its quality management system (meeting the standards of ISO 9001:2008) and also recognized by Accreditation of Vietnam for meeting the standards of ISO/IEC 17025:2005 in testing and calibrating capacity (determining gold content).

2012

The August incident in 2012 had a serious impact on various activities of ACB; however, it took quick actions and adopted drastic measures in response.

2013

In 2013, although the business results missed expectations, ACB achieved positive growth rates in terms of deposit taking and lending. Bad debt was kept under 3%. ACB managed to better arrange its personnel and cut headcounts. ACB began implementing the restructuring roadmap (2013 – 2015), as stipulated by the SBV.

2014

In 2014, ACB upgraded the old core banking platform, which had been in use for 14 years, to a new version called the DNA. ACB developed a risk management framework to fully comply with new regulations regarding prudential ratios. ACB’s branches grew in size and performance improved.

2015

New branding was introduced on January 05, 2015, including a new logo, façade signages at branches and sub-branches, etc. ACB also completed its strategic plans including (i) branch/sub-branch restructuring, (ii) establishment of the domestic payment center (the first stage), and (iii) completion of key performance indicators for units and staff at the Headquarters. In addition, ACB implemented projects regarding transaction banking, privilege banking, and customer management systems, etc.

2016

In 2016, ACB completed as per schedule multiple items of technology projects, including the changing of ACBS’s core system; improvement in IT applications such as CLMS, CRM, ACMS, ELM, PASS to support the streamlining of business processes; upgrading ATM system and ACB website to increase utility and customer payment service, etc. Furthermore, ACB continued to complete strategic plan including (i) transaction banking, (ii) privilege banking, (iii) business process re-engineering – ACMS (phase 1), etc. in order to improve competitiveness. And particularly, during the year ACB successfully restructured the organization and operational model, with increased performance of its branches/ sub-branches and more streamlined organization of its Headquarters units.

2017

In 2017, ACB continued to improve policies, procedures, and risk management limits in order to comply with regulations of the State Bank of Vietnam. ACB achieved positive results in terms of operations and customer service quality: staff efficiency improved by 20%; working errors fell by 50%; and customer satisfaction improved. ACB is one of the top banks in terms of customer service quality. ACB continued with the plan of restructuring the branch network, grouping branches and sub-branches into clusters, and clusters into regions. Offices were relocated to further penetrate key markets and to develop new markets with potential. Consequently, performance of the branch network improved remarkably, and more than 94% of branches were profitable. Restructuring of the human resource continued, with a focus on sales forces with high capability and efficiency, and development and nurture of the successors.

2018

In 2018, ACB ensured the sustainability of consumer banking and SME as well as controlled the credit quality and safe operation effectively. The credit growth of these two areas was outstanding in conjunction with the ALCO’s direction. Deposit was improved leading to the increase of CASA from 16.7% to 17.5%. Card sales released better figures compared to the previous year. The bank issued VND4,400 billion of AAA bonds with 3-year and 10-year term. Debt was settled and collected resulting in the income from debt ettlement was fourfold higher than 2017. ACB has gradually built the platforms, continued to enhance its operation capability for the transformation and development in the period of 2019 – 2024.

2019

The year 2019 marked the first year in the implementation of the refreshed ACB’s Strategy for the period 2019 – 2024. In the revised strategy, ACB aims to be the leading private bank in Vietnam with good profitability driven by a clear strategy focusing on three business segments. Consumer banking and SME banking are the two key growth priorities, while corporate banking (for mid-market and large corporations) is a selective growth business. Strategic objectives are to grow consumer banking and total SME income by 20% per annum, deliver the best customer experience, and become one of the most profitable banks with an ROE >20%. To achieve these 2024 targets, a transformation plan has been devised to tightly manage multiple critical initiatives that will drive change.

2020

The balance sheet in year 2020 illustrates the sustainability and quality of ongoing growth. Customer deposits and loans were up over 15% and 16%, respectively, higher than the average rate in the market. The liquidity was strong, non-performing loan (NPL) was under control at low level and profitability was high. 2020 witnessed that ACB switched from HNX to HOSE and exclusively contracted with Sun Life Vietnam (a member of Sun Life Group Canada) which is a leading insurer in Vietnam. ACB enhanced further its risk management and capital. Subsidiaries helped contribute to the Group’s profit.

2021

Financial targets were successfully accomplished in 2021. The bank has prioritized digitalization and technology applications in operations to save time and effort, for example, implementing eKYC technology in online account opening, the mobile app was upgraded for individual customers, online disbursement is available via ACB Online, and the ACB Business Application serves corporate customers, etc. in order to assist customers to make payments easily and quickly.

2022

ACB launched the digital banking brand ACB One, a milestone marking the digitalization of the bank’s operations to optimize customer experience. Capital adequacy and liquidity risk control met the Basel III requirements, as reviewed by KPMG.

## Business lines

Deposit

Short-, middle- and long-term deposits; non-term deposit; deposits of domestic organizations and borrowings from other credit institutions.

Lending

Short-, middle- and long-term lending.

Discount

Discount of commercial papers, bonds and valuable papers.

Capital contribution and joint venture in accordance with applicable laws

Capital contribution and joint venture in accordance with applicable laws.

Settlement

Settlement services, foreign currency exchange, gold trading, overseas payments, overseas capital mobilization and other overseas banking services permitted by the State Bank of Vietnam.

metadata/description: ACB is one of the leading joint stock commercial banks in Vietnam, with an extensive branch network and over 12,000 employees, with a wide range of products and services.
metadata/openGraph/1/content: ACB is one of the leading joint stock commercial banks in Vietnam, with an extensive branch network and over 12,000 employees, with a wide range of products and services.
text:
History
Establishment date
June 04, 1993
ACB started operations on June 04, 1993.
Listing time
November 21, 2006
ACB listed on Hanoi Securities Trading Center (now re-named as Hanoi Stock Exchange – HNX) pursuant to Decision No. 21/QĐ-TTGDHN dated October 31, 2006. The first transaction date was November 21, 2006. ACB listed on Hochiminh Stock Exchange (HOSE) pursuant to Decision No. 573/QĐ-SGDHCM dated November 20, 2020.
1993 - 1995
Embryonic stage of development.
The founders shared the common business principle of “managing the development of the enterprise in a safe and effective way.”
Targeted segments included households and private SMEs.
1996 - 2000
Became the first private Vietnamese bank to issue the international credit cards (MasterCard and Visa).
Approach modern banking services and products.
Launched an IT modernization program.
Rearranged the organizational structure of Headquarters in order to facilitate business and support activities.
Established ACB Securities Company (ACBS).
2001 - 2005
Adopted the ISO 9001:2000 quality management system and registered for recognition of (i) deposit taking, (ii) short and long-term lending, (iii) trade services, and (iv) human resource processes at the Headquarters.
Standard Chartered Bank (SCB) signed an agreement to provide ACB with comprehensive technical assistance, and became an ACB shareholder.
Carried out the second phase of the IT modernization program.
2006 - 2010
Listed on the Hanoi Stock Exchange.
Rapid expansion of the branch network: 223 offices were put into operation, a leap from 58 offices in 2005 to 281 offices in 2010.
Established ACB Leasing (ACBL).
Issued 10 million shares with par value of VND100 billion, with the proceeds of more
than VND1,800 billion (2007); and increased its chartered capital to VND6,355 billion (2008).
Built a standard data backup center in Dong Nai Province.
Awarded two Labor Medals by the Government, and recognized by various prestigious financial magazines and organizations as the best bank in Vietnam.
2011
The “Strategic Directions for 2011 to 2015 and the Vision to 2020” was issued. 
An enterprise module data center was put into operation.
ACB Gold Manufacturing Center was the first business in the industry certified by
QMS Australia for its quality management system (meeting the standards of ISO 9001:2008) and also recognized by Accreditation of Vietnam for meeting the standards of ISO/IEC 17025:2005 in testing and calibrating capacity (determining gold content).
2012
The August incident in 2012 had a serious impact on various activities of ACB; however, it took quick actions and adopted drastic measures in response.
2013
In 2013, although the business results missed expectations, ACB achieved positive growth rates in terms of deposit taking and lending. Bad debt was kept under 3%. ACB managed to better arrange its personnel and cut headcounts. ACB began implementing the restructuring roadmap (2013 – 2015), as stipulated by the SBV.
2014
In 2014, ACB upgraded the old core banking platform, which had been in use for 14 years, to a new version called the DNA. ACB developed a risk management framework to fully comply with new regulations regarding prudential ratios. ACB’s branches grew in size and performance improved.
2015
New branding was introduced on January 05, 2015, including a new logo, façade signages at branches and sub-branches, etc. ACB also completed its strategic plans including (i) branch/sub-branch restructuring, (ii) establishment of the domestic payment center (the first stage), and (iii) completion of key performance indicators for units and staff at the Headquarters. In addition, ACB implemented projects regarding transaction banking, privilege banking, and customer management systems, etc.
2016
In 2016, ACB completed as per schedule multiple items of technology projects, including the changing of ACBS’s core system; improvement in IT applications such as CLMS, CRM, ACMS, ELM, PASS to support the streamlining of business processes; upgrading ATM system and ACB website to increase utility and customer payment service, etc. Furthermore, ACB continued to complete strategic plan including (i) transaction banking, (ii) privilege banking, (iii) business process re-engineering – ACMS (phase 1), etc. in order to improve competitiveness. And particularly, during the year ACB successfully restructured the organization and operational model, with increased performance of its branches/ sub-branches and more streamlined organization of its Headquarters units.
2017
In 2017, ACB continued to improve policies, procedures, and risk management limits in order to comply with regulations of the State Bank of Vietnam. ACB achieved positive results in terms of operations and customer service quality: staff efficiency improved by 20%; working errors fell by 50%; and customer satisfaction improved. ACB is one of the top banks in terms of customer service quality. ACB continued with the plan of restructuring the branch network, grouping branches and sub-branches into clusters, and clusters into regions. Offices were relocated to further penetrate key markets and to develop new markets with potential. Consequently, performance of the branch network improved remarkably, and more than 94% of branches were profitable. Restructuring of the human resource continued, with a focus on sales forces with high capability and efficiency, and development and nurture of the successors.
2018
In 2018, ACB ensured the sustainability of consumer banking and SME as well as controlled the credit quality and safe operation effectively. The credit growth of these two areas was outstanding in conjunction with the ALCO’s direction. Deposit was improved leading to the increase of CASA from 16.7% to 17.5%. Card sales released better figures compared to the previous year. The bank issued VND4,400 billion of AAA bonds with 3-year and 10-year term. Debt was settled and collected resulting in the income from debt ettlement was fourfold higher than 2017. ACB has gradually built the platforms, continued to enhance its operation capability for the transformation and development in the period of 2019 – 2024.
2019
The year 2019 marked the first year in the implementation of the refreshed ACB’s Strategy for the period 2019 – 2024. In the revised strategy, ACB aims to be the leading private bank in Vietnam with good profitability driven by a clear strategy focusing on three business segments. Consumer banking and SME banking are the two key growth priorities, while corporate banking (for mid-market and large corporations) is a selective growth business. Strategic objectives are to grow consumer banking and total SME income by 20% per annum, deliver the best customer experience, and become one of the most profitable banks with an ROE >20%. To achieve these 2024 targets, a transformation plan has been devised to tightly manage multiple critical initiatives that will drive change.
2020
The balance sheet in year 2020 illustrates the sustainability and quality of ongoing growth. Customer deposits and loans were up over 15% and 16%, respectively, higher than the average rate in the market. The liquidity was strong, non-performing loan (NPL) was under control at low level and profitability was high. 2020 witnessed that ACB switched from HNX to HOSE and exclusively contracted with Sun Life Vietnam (a member of Sun Life Group Canada) which is a leading insurer in Vietnam. ACB enhanced further its risk management and capital. Subsidiaries helped contribute to the Group’s profit.
2021
Financial targets were successfully accomplished in 2021. The bank has prioritized digitalization and technology applications in operations to save time and effort, for example, implementing eKYC technology in online account opening, the mobile app was upgraded for individual customers, online disbursement is available via ACB Online, and the ACB Business Application serves corporate customers, etc. in order to assist customers to make payments easily and quickly.
2022
ACB launched the digital banking brand ACB One, a milestone marking the digitalization of the bank’s operations to optimize customer experience. Capital adequacy and liquidity risk control met the Basel III requirements, as reviewed by KPMG.
Business lines
Deposit
Short-, middle- and long-term deposits; non-term deposit; deposits of domestic organizations and borrowings from other credit institutions.
Lending
Short-, middle- and long-term lending.
Discount
Discount of commercial papers, bonds and valuable papers.
Capital contribution and joint venture in accordance with applicable laws
Capital contribution and joint venture in accordance with applicable laws.
Settlement
Settlement services, foreign currency exchange, gold trading, overseas payments, overseas capital mobilization and other overseas banking services permitted by the State Bank of Vietnam.

markdown:
Direct the shift in mindset and raising the awareness of application of technology to improve and develop work. The digitization of processes (digitalization) is the responsibility of the dedicated units as well as all the internal entities in performing their functions and duties.

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/xzyrJIzsv8ak9tyGLZIxx6Jb9Rq7QP7cdGvi5hMh.jpg&w=3840&q=75)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/LJAIvgJAei3q38PpvPUnYjBnOJwdj6Efm2Nrq120.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

Dear Shareholders,

During the past ten years (2012 – 2022), the Board of Directors has established and implemented an effective risk management system and a dynamic business apparatus, allowing the bank to accomplish the annual goals and strategic objectives.

In the first five-year period (2013 – 2017), the Board of Directors focused resources on overcoming the consequences left behind from the past by changing business models, arranging qualified personnel suitable for various work positions, strengthening the distribution channel system, and making adequate provision for outstanding bad debts.

The following five years (2018 – 2022) witnessed a breakthrough in many aspects. Business performance was increasing year over year and ROE, which represents value to shareholders, has always been among the highest in the market. In addition to basic traditional activities, ACB also explored new business segments such as bancassurance, which have brought in great revenue, and promoting digital banking activities.

In general, the total assets have grown steadily, the cost-to income ratio has significantly improved, business performance has been impressive, the quality of services continues to improve, and our credibility is viewed highly by the SBV and other rating agencies.

Looking back at the history of the bank since establishment, in each stage of its development, ACB has paid attention to the environmental, social, and governance aspects to various degrees. In the past ten years, ACB has focused on changing employees’ awareness of environmental protection, from not caring to being concerned, and then to committing to readily take action and actually fulfilling each individual’s responsibility regarding this aspiration. Starting in 2022, the environmental protection program has started to spread to other stakeholders of ACB.

The Board of Directors confirms that the ESG program, especially the E (environmental) factor, shall be an important part of ACB’s business strategy.

At the beginning of 2022, the Board of Directors appointed the new CEO & President, whose career has grown from the position of credit officer at ACB in 1996 and has made countless positive and effective contributions. The Board of Management will have to execute key programs to successfully implement the 2019–2024 strategy, ensuring that ACB has high growth, safe and effective operations as expected by shareholders, and possesses sustainable competitiveness.

Dear Shareholders,
During the past ten years (2012 – 2022), the Board of Directors has established and implemented an effective risk management system and a dynamic business apparatus, allowing the bank to accomplish the annual goals and strategic objectives.
In the first five-year period (2013 – 2017), the Board of Directors focused resources on overcoming the consequences left behind from the past by changing business models, arranging qualified personnel suitable for various work positions, strengthening the distribution channel system, and making adequate provision for outstanding bad debts.
The following five years (2018 – 2022) witnessed a breakthrough in many aspects. Business performance was increasing year over year and ROE, which represents value to shareholders, has always been among the highest in the market. In addition to basic traditional activities, ACB also explored new business segments such as bancassurance, which have brought in great revenue, and promoting digital banking activities.
In general, the total assets have grown steadily, the cost-to income ratio has significantly improved, business performance has been impressive, the quality of services continues to improve, and our credibility is viewed highly by the SBV and other rating agencies.
Looking back at the history of the bank since establishment, in each stage of its development, ACB has paid attention to the environmental, social, and governance aspects to various degrees. In the past ten years, ACB has focused on changing employees’ awareness of environmental protection, from not caring to being concerned, and then to committing to readily take action and actually fulfilling each individual’s responsibility regarding this aspiration. Starting in 2022, the environmental protection program has started to spread to other stakeholders of ACB.
The Board of Directors confirms that the ESG program, especially the E (environmental) factor, shall be an important part of ACB’s business strategy.
At the beginning of 2022, the Board of Directors appointed the new CEO & President, whose career has grown from the position of credit officer at ACB in 1996 and has made countless positive and effective contributions. The Board of Management will have to execute key programs to successfully implement the 2019–2024 strategy, ensuring that ACB has high growth, safe and effective operations as expected by shareholders, and possesses sustainable competitiveness.

Joined ACB in 2008. Served as Manager of Credit Analysis Department, Deputy Head of Corporate Banking Division and Head of Corporate Credit Approval Center, branch manager, and Regional Manager. Appointed as Executive Vice President in 2023. Graduated from University of Economics HCMC (UEH) with

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/nguyen_khac_nguyen.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### Mr. Nguyen Khac Nguyen

###### Executive Vice President

Joined ACB in 2006. Served as Internal Communication Manager, Head of Brand and Communication Department, Deputy Head of Human Resources Division, Head of Learning Hub, and Head of Human Resources Division. Appointed as Executive Vice President in 2022. Graduated from University of Economics HC

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/dam_van_tuan.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### Mr. Dam Van Tuan

###### Executive Vice President

Joined ACB in 1994. Held various positions including branch deputy manager, branch manager, Head of International Relations Department, Head of Strategic Planning Department, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of ACBA, Head of Human Resources Division. He was appointed Executive Vice President in 2001. Pr

#### Ms. Nguyen Thi Tuyet Van

###### Executive Vice President

Joined ACB in 2008. Served as Head of Business Development Division, External Relations Officer (2013 – 2020). Previously, she worked at the State Bank – HCMC Branch. Appointed as Executive Vice President in 2015. Graduated from Banking University HCMC (BUH) with bachelor’s degree in economics

Chief Accountant

#### Ms. Duong Thi Nguyet

###### Chief Accountant

Joined ACB in 1997. Served as Interbank Settlement Accounting Team Lead (HQ Accounting Department), Treasury Accounting Sub-department Manager (under Chief Accountant), Accounting Department Deputy Manager.

Executive Vice President
Joined ACB in 1994. Held various positions including branch deputy manager, branch manager, Head of International Relations Department, Head of Strategic Planning Department, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of ACBA, Head of Human Resources Division. He was appointed Executive Vice President in 2001. Pr
Ms. Nguyen Thi Tuyet Van
Executive Vice President
Joined ACB in 2008. Served as Head of Business Development Division, External Relations Officer (2013 – 2020). Previously, she worked at the State Bank – HCMC Branch. Appointed as Executive Vice President in 2015. Graduated from Banking University HCMC (BUH) with bachelor’s degree in economics
Chief Accountant
Ms. Duong Thi Nguyet
Chief Accountant
Joined ACB in 1997. Served as Interbank Settlement Accounting Team Lead (HQ Accounting Department), Treasury Accounting Sub-department Manager (under Chief Accountant), Accounting Department Deputy Manager.

###### Waiving all fees

Free account management fee

###### Up to 5% cashback

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/20cGjtkAcFjlpwlO9d2zu0LTt2MJywUjVTqKW3Ad.jpg&w=3840&q=80)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/Jb1clorRHsx9z7rXHqj7iXunVjqQguv2J3BRFSt7.jpg&w=3840&q=80) * [ Home ](https://acb.com.vn/en) * /[ Personal - Insurance ](https://acb.com.vn/en/personal-protect) * /Supplemental Insurance - Quality Life ## Supplemental Insurance - Quality Life ###### Freedom of choice DIFFERENT and OPTIONAL with 5 Insurance Plans for each unique need in Inpatient, Outpatient, Dental, Maternity. ###### Class service: Support inpatient treatment costs up to 3 BILLION VND, global protection\* and guarantee hospital fees with a network of reputable medical facilities. (\*) Applicable according to terms and conditions, when choosing a Moon Insurance Plan ###### Share love TRANSFER unused limit between family members to OPTIMIZE the health care fund for themselves and their loved ones, total limit up to 21 billion VND (\*\*) Apply according to terms and conditions, when participating in Inpatient Benefit of Moon Insurance Plan for family of 7 members ## Summary of benefits ###### Freedom to plan health care according to your needs with a variety of options Unit: VND Dong | | | | | | | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | Plan | Water | Land | Cloud | Star | Moon | | Covered geographical coverage | Việt Nam | Việt Nam | Asia | Global (except US) | Global | Insurance money | | | | | | | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | Plan | Water | Land | Cloud | Star | Moon | | Right
Inpatient treatment
(default) | 100 triệu | 200 triệu | 500 triệu | 1 tỷ | 3 tỷ | | Right
Outpatient treatment
(option) | 5 triệu | 10 triệu | 20 triệu | 40 triệu | 120 triệu | | Right
Dental treatment
(option) | 2 triệu | 4 triệu | 10 triệu | 15 triệu | 30 triệu | | Right
Maternity care
(option) | 15 triệu | 25 triệu | 35 triệu | 50 triệu | 120 triệu | Health care for you and your family in the most different way | | | | --- | --- | | Benefits of sharing love
(option) | Optimizing health care funds for family members | ###### General information Age of insurance: 30 days old - 70 years old For Maternity Care Benefit, the Insured Person is a female from 18 - 45 years old Term of Insurance: 1 year, with auto-renew annually\* Premium: Calculated according to the age of the Insured at the time of issue of this Supplement and then adjusted for age at Policy Year Anniversaries\*\* (\*) This Supplement is considered for renewal at each Policy Year Anniversary until the Policyholder requests to terminate the validity of this Supplement; or the Insured Person no longer meets the age-insured conditions set forth in these Additional Product Terms and Conditions; or Sun Life Vietnam discontinues the Supplemental Product or Plan(s). (\*\*) With the approval of the Ministry of Finance, Sun Life Vietnam may change the Premium of this Supplement. Sun Life Vietnam will notify the Policyholder at least 3 months before this change takes effect and the new Premium will be applied on the next Policy Year Anniversary. ## Promotion [![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/_next/static/media/notFound.c16f4396.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/404) 31/03/2024 - 30/04/2024 5 days 13:45:04 [ Read more ](https://acb.com.vn/en/404) [![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/_next/static/media/notFound.c16f4396.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/404) 31/03/2024 - 30/04/2024 5 days 13:45:04 [ Read more ](https://acb.com.vn/en/404) [![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/_next/static/media/notFound.c16f4396.jpg&w=3840&q=75)](https://acb.com.vn/en/404) 31/03/2024 - 30/04/2024 5 days 13:45:04 [ Read more ](https://acb.com.vn/en/404) ## Registration for consultation

Optimizing health care funds for family members
	
General information
Age of insurance: 30 days old - 70 years old
For Maternity Care Benefit, the Insured Person is a female from 18 - 45 years old
Term of Insurance: 1 year, with auto-renew annually*
Premium: Calculated according to the age of the Insured at the time of issue of this Supplement and then adjusted for age at Policy Year Anniversaries**
(*) This Supplement is considered for renewal at each Policy Year Anniversary until the Policyholder requests to terminate the validity of this Supplement; or the Insured Person no longer meets the age-insured conditions set forth in these Additional Product Terms and Conditions; or Sun Life Vietnam discontinues the Supplemental Product or Plan(s).
(**) With the approval of the Ministry of Finance, Sun Life Vietnam may change the Premium of this Supplement. Sun Life Vietnam will notify the Policyholder at least 3 months before this change takes effect and the new Premium will be applied on the next Policy Year Anniversary.

## The superior benefits of the product

Death benefit: If the Insured dies unfortunately during the Insurance Period, Sun Life Vietnam will immediately pay 100% of the Sum Insured to the customer.

Total and Permanent Disability Benefit: If the Insured Person is unfortunately totally and permanently disabled before age 65 and during the Insurance Period, Sun Life Vietnam will pay 100% of the Insured Amount to the Customer. row.  
​Tra cứu thông tin chi tiết

## General information

Age of insurance: 30 days old to 59 years old

Insurance money:

*   Minimum: 50 million VND
*   Maximum: 500% of the main product insurance amount

Feepayment period: Year, Half year, Quarter

## ACB Visa Platinum

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/uVuVjg3orUQ7eBqgvRBx6ZkEQ8HtzE782aHIulMM.png&w=640&q=75)

Cashback for all spending at supermarkets

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/oDoPGYuep4XAzGnZFgtCLNkrGpJZEqwp0rcLKEL3.jpg&w=3840&q=75)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/5ehtrQuv95SX7Vhcl28zomkfDKeVGtlsWe7jQQQZ.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### Up to 10% cashback at supermarkets and convenience stores

Up to 10% cashback at supermarkets and convenience stores such as Co-opmart, Winmart, Lotte, BigC, Aeon Mall, Family Mart, Circle K, etc.

#### 0.5% cashback for other spending

Up to VND 3.6 million per year.

#### 0% interest installment

Convert lump sum payment into installment plan easily with 0% interest installment feature.

## Benefits

*   10% cashback for all purchases at supermarkets and convenience stores for ACB cardholders owning ACB account to receive salary. 6% cashback for other cardholders. 0.5% cashback for other spending.
*   Maximum cashback: VND 3,600,000 per year, and VND 300,000 per bank statement.
*   Zero interest and competitive fee: Customers can proactively choose to pay in installments on ACB ONE or through partner’s systems; also applicable to repayment of cash advance.
*   Grace period up to 55 days, buy first pay later with minimum payment at 5% of spending in the month. Annual fee: VND 1,299,000.

## Features

*   Touch to pay with your ACB Visa card through Google Wallet: Add your ACB Visa card to your Google Wallet account on mobile phone to make contactless payments at POS or via online.
*   Contactless payment (advanced, quick, safe): Touch or wave your card in front of the POS devices to make payments.
*   3D Secure: Online transaction authentication method with OTP for safe card payments.

## Requirements

Any individual customer with Vietnamese or foreign nationality, from 18 to 67 years old, living in Vietnam and satisfying the conditions for VISA Platinum credit cards under ACB’s regulations.

## References

LIST OF SUPERMARKETS AND CONVENIENCE STORE APPLY REFUND

REFUND MANUAL FOR CREDIT CARD holders ON ACB ONE APP

##

## ACB Visa Signature

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/yCzMDjvnWfNhmfy9G1GVOoPIL8tBRM2jX598wYnn.png&w=640&q=75)

Thousands of journeys, thousands of spices

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/oDoPGYuep4XAzGnZFgtCLNkrGpJZEqwp0rcLKEL3.jpg&w=3840&q=75)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/5ehtrQuv95SX7Vhcl28zomkfDKeVGtlsWe7jQQQZ.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### Cashback for all transactions

10% cashback for travel, hotel and flight booking, and 0.5% for other spending. Enjoy your journey to the fullest.

#### Free travel voucher

Cardholders reaching a spending target will get a travel voucher, valuing up to VND 4 million.

#### Business lounges

One access to business lounges every quarter at over 1,200 international airports.

## Benefits

*   10% cashback for travel, hotel and flight booking. 0.5% cashback for other spending.
*   Maximum cashback: VND 6,000,000 per year, and VND 500,000 per bank statement.
*   Travel voucher valuing up to VND 4 million for customers reaching a spending target.
*   One access to business lounges every quarter at over 1,200 international airports.
*   Zero interest and competitive fee: Customers can proactively choose to pay in installments on ACB ONE or through partner’s systems; also applicable to repayment of cash advance.
*   Grace period up to 55 days, buy first pay later with minimum payment at 5% of spending in a month. Annual fee: VND 1,900,000.

## Features

*   Touch to pay with your ACB Visa card through Google Wallet: Add your ACB Visa card to your Google Wallet account on mobile phone to make contactless payments at POS or via online.
*   Contactless payment: Touch or wave your card in front of the POS devices to make payments.
*   3D Secure: Online transaction authentication method with OTP for safe card payments.

## Requirements

Any individual customer with Vietnamese or foreign nationality, from 18 to 67 years old, living in Vietnam and satisfying the conditions for VISA Signature/Privilege Signature credit cards under ACB’s regulations.

## References

## ACB Visa Digi Debit

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/2hVDZ0CtlFrZ8LsqDG1q4EE7tVQU7cgTG4lD8HZp.png&w=640&q=75)

For online international transactions.

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/oDoPGYuep4XAzGnZFgtCLNkrGpJZEqwp0rcLKEL3.jpg&w=3840&q=75)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/5ehtrQuv95SX7Vhcl28zomkfDKeVGtlsWe7jQQQZ.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### Competitive exchange rates

We offer competitive exchange rates for online international transactions.

#### Multiple cards opening within a day

A customer can open up to 10 cards, cards can be received at the counter quickly within a day.

#### 24/7 customer service

Through our 247 Contact Center.

## Benefits

*   Competitive exchange rates for online international transactions.
*   Multiple cards opening, up to 10 cards per customer.
*   High transactional limits: Up to 200 transactions per day for standard package; or 999 transactions per day for high limit package with free registration.

## Features

*   Touch to pay with your ACB Visa card through Google Wallet: Add your ACB Visa card to your Google Wallet account on mobile phone to make contactless payments at POS or via online.
*   Contactless payment: Touch or wave your card in front of the POS devices to make payments.
*   3D Secure: Online transaction authentication method with OTP for safe card payments.

## Requirements

*   Online card opening via ACB ONE: In only 3 minutes, we will issue card and deliver to your home at your request.
*   Card opening at any ACB branch/sub-branch nationwide: In only 15 minutes.

## References

ONLINE PAYMENT TRANSACTION LIMITS

## ACB JCB GOLD (CREDIT)

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/CfpL7DiaAybwh7RndBRevldtF1rrdn47qQZSghTJ.png&w=640&q=75)

A financial solution for customer’s needs of short-term loan.

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/oDoPGYuep4XAzGnZFgtCLNkrGpJZEqwp0rcLKEL3.jpg&w=3840&q=75)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/5ehtrQuv95SX7Vhcl28zomkfDKeVGtlsWe7jQQQZ.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### Cash advance free of charge

Cash advance up to 100% limit free of charge at ACB’s ATMs and at all ACB branches/ sub-branches nationwide.

#### 25% interest rate

Interest rate is only 25%, the lowest in the market.

#### 0% interest installment

0% interest on installment of cash advance with competitive fees.

## Benefits

*   No charge on cash advance at ACB’s ATMs and at all ACB branches/sub-branches nationwide, with 25% interest rate only.
*   Cash advance limit up to 100% of credit card limit.
*   Low charge on cash advance at ATMs of other banks, only 2% of drawn amount, min. VND 30,000.
*   Zero interest and competitive fee: Customers can proactively choose to pay in installments on ACB ONE or through partner’s systems; also applicable to repayment of cash advance.
*   Grace period up to 45 days, buy first pay later with minimum payment at 5% of spending in the month. Annual fee: VND 400,000.

## Features

*   Contactless payment and EMV-standard chip: Touch or wave your card in front of the POS devices to make payments.
*   3D Secure: Online transaction authentication method with OTP for safe card payments.

## Requirements

Any individual customer of Vietnamese or foreign nationality, from 18 to 67 years old, living in Vietnam and satisfying the conditions for JCB Gold credit cards under ACB’s regulations.

#### 2% cashback at supermarkets and convenience stores

Shop at supermarkets, bring ACB cards. 2% cashback at supermarkets and convenience stores such as Co-opmart, Winmart, Lotte, BigC, Aeon Mall, Family Mart, Circle K, etc.

#### 1% cashback for all other spending

All transactions with ACB Visa Debit Card are eligible for 1% cashback.

#### Up to VND 300,000 cashback a month

Spend and get cashback up to VND 300,000 per month with your ACB Visa Debit Card.

## Benefits

*   2% cashback for all purchases at supermarkets and convenience stores.
*   1% cashback for other spending.
*   Maximum cashback: VND 300,000/month.
*   Monthly cashback is credited automatically to the current account linked up with the card.

## Features

*   Touch to pay with your ACB Visa card through Google Wallet: Add your ACB Visa card to your Google Wallet account on mobile phone to make contactless payments at POS or via online.
*   Contactless payment: Touch or wave your card in front of the POS devices to make payments.
*   3D Secure: Online transaction authentication method with OTP for safe card payments.

## Requirements

*   Online card opening via ACB ONE: In only 3 minutes, we will issue card and deliver to your home at your request.
*   Card opening at any ACB branch/sub-branch nationwide: In only 15 minutes.

## ACB Express

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/CfVaEP97Bob6aeYoBfRmTXMrq0nsGzoERjPVDUXo.png&w=640&q=75)

Công cụ đắc lực đáp ứng nhu cầu tài chính ngắn hạn

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/oDoPGYuep4XAzGnZFgtCLNkrGpJZEqwp0rcLKEL3.jpg&w=3840&q=75)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/5ehtrQuv95SX7Vhcl28zomkfDKeVGtlsWe7jQQQZ.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

#### Miễn phí rút tiền mặt

Miễn phí rút tiền mặt tại tất cả ATM và Chi nhánh/Phòng giao dịch ACB trên toàn quốc

#### Lãi suất 15%

Lãi suất trong hạn 15% thấp nhất thị trường. Công cụ đắc lực phục vụ nhu cầu tài chính ngắn hạn

#### Trả góp 0%

Chuyển đổi chi tiêu lớn thành giao dịch nhỏ hàng tháng thật nhẹ nhàng với tính năng Trả góp 0%

## Benefits

*   Exclusively for customers having ACB account to receive salary. No charge on cash advance at ACB’s ATMs and at all ACB branches/sub-branches nationwide.
*   Cash advance limit up to 100% of credit card limit.
*   Low charge on cash advance at ATMs of other banks, only 2% of drawn amount, min. VND 30,000.
*   Zero interest and competitive fee: Customers can proactively choose to pay in installments on ACB ONE or through partner’s systems; also applicable to repayment of cash advance.
*   Grace period up to 45 days, buy first pay later with minimum payment at 3% of spending in the month. Annual fee: VND 299,000.

## Features

*   Secure VCCS chip: Cards are embedded with VCCS-standard chip to reduce fraud and deception, and applied contactless technology for quick and convenient payments.

## Requirements

*   Any individual customer of Vietnamese or foreign nationality, from 18 to 67 years old, living in Vietnam and satisfying the conditions for Express (Napas) credit cards under ACB’s regulations.

Competitive fees

markdown:
**A. Receive Western Union transfers**

**1.Receive Western Union transfer at the counter:**

The recipient comes to the nearest ACB - Western Union transaction point: Refer to the Western Union money receiving network

Fill in the “To Receive money” form with: tracking number (10-digit MTCN); Recipient’s name; Sender's name; sending country; Amount expected to receive (+/- 10%)

Give the “To Receive money” form with personal identification (ID/Passport) to the teller

Receive your money

**2.Receive Western Union transfer on ACB online**

Clients can receive money anytime, anywhere, without receipt form or personal identification:

Log in to your ACB Online account to register for the service

Select the registered current account (VND or USD account) to receive fund in the corresponding currency

Input transaction information (MTCN, amount, sending country ...) & verify information for the system to process the transaction

Money is credited into account as soon as the transaction is completed

**B. Transfer money abroad via Western Union:**

At ACB's branch/sub-branch:

Sender fills request form for money transfer and "To Send Money" form, attaches required documents for specific recipients and transfer purposes.

For Vietnamese people: money transfer must comply with regulations

For foreigners: proof of source of money must be enclosed

Transfer purposes:

Expenses for studying abroad

Medical treatment abroad

Abroad business trip

Traveling/visiting abroad

Payment of fees and charges at other country

Support for relatives living abroad

Transfer of inheritance money to overseas heirs

###### Exchange rate hedge

Protect your business against the risk of exchange rate fluctuations

Effective cash flow management, help corporate financial planning

Forward foreign currency transaction (Forward) is a transaction to buy and sell foreign currencies at the exchange rate determined on the transaction date, effective for payment on a specified date in the future within 03 working days to 365 days from the date of transaction

Forward foreign currency transaction (Forward) is a transaction to buy and sell foreign currencies at the exchange rate determined on the transaction date, effective for payment on a specified date in the future within 03 working days to 365 days from the date of transaction
ACB sells foreign currency forwards
Documents proving the purpose of use, showing the amount, type of foreign currency and time of payment.
Foreign currency forward contract
Product advantages
Hedging against exchange rate fluctuations.
Helping clients in financial planning.

Proof of incoming money future source.

markdown:
## Features

###### Competitivity

Competitive rates.

###### Multiple currencies

Foreign exchange with more than 28 currencies (US Dollar - USD, Euro - EUR, British Pound - GBP, Australian Dollar - AUD...)

###### Swiftness

Quick processing to satisfy client’s demand for payments

## Characteristics

###### Product definition

Spot foreign exchange transaction (Spot) is a transaction in which the client and ACB determine to buy or sell an amount of foreign currency quoting the forex rate at the time of transaction and payment is made within the same day or within next two (02) working days

###### Documentation

ACB buying foreign currency from clients: Payment Order/Spot foreign currency purchase contract

ACB selling foreign currency to client: clients provide documents proving the purpose of use according to current regulations on foreign exchange management:

*   Set of international payment documents
*   Letter of request for ACB to sell foreign currency/Spot foreign currency sale contract

###### Templates

Payment Order

Letter of request for ACB to sell foreign currency

Spot foreign currency purchase contract

*   Letter of request for ACB to sell foreign currency/Spot foreign currency sale contract

## 

Working capital loan

To meet working capital needs for production and business activities, the maximum loan term is 12 months.

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Loans
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-borrow)
*   /Working capital loan

## Benefits

*   24/7 transactions.
*   Shortened loan procedures.
*   Time and cost saving from traveling to and waiting at the counter.
*   247 online disbursements: [details here](https://acb.com.vn/doanh-nghiep-vay-von/giai-ngan-online-247)

## Features

*   Only one application required for multiple loans

Businesses only have to prepare one application for multiple loans in a business cycle (no more than 12 months).

*   No limit on disbursement volume

Limit on loan balance only; no limit on disbursements. The total disbursement volume during the loan period may be greater than the credit limit if the businesses regularly repay the loan.

*   Financially proactive

Businesses can proactively control their borrowing amounts when granted a credit limit.

## Eligible customers

*   Businesses with frequent funding needs and fast working capital turnover.

## 

References

## Contact

*   ACB branches/sub-branches in [this list](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2), or
*   24/7 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 – (028) 38 247 247 – 1800 57 77 75

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/Z3EzCnIU06mm6ke4msMbR1AgJqnmjOAZiY3ctstI.jpg&w=3840&q=80)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/1b7NBDSZuH7350nqUGRnxv96GLkaUNIxGAArPBfK.jpg&w=3840&q=80)

## 

247 online disbursements

Businesses can receive loan disbursement online, no need to visit ACB’s offices.

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Loans
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-borrow)
*   /247 online disbursements

## Benefits

*   24/7 transactions; 
*   Reduced loan procedures;
*   Time and cost saving from travelling to and waiting at the counter.

## Features

*   No visit to the bank   
    Proactively request and confirm disbursement via ACB Online. 
*   Cash in within 3 minutes.   
    Disbursement orders is processed quickly, and customers will receive money within 3 minutes.
*   Applicable products   
    Line of credit for working capital;
*   Disbursement method   
    Bank transfer to the beneficiary inside or outside ACB network;
*   Collateral  
    In accordance with applicable policy on credit activities of ACB.

## Eligible customers

*   SME businesses in the Ho Chi Minh City satisfying the following conditions:

Have a valid credit limit from ACB;   
Has fulfilled the conditions before disbursement toward ACB;  
Use ACB online products with electronic signature as the authentication method;  
Has signed agreement(s) on online disbursement with ACB;   
The credit granted meets the applicable requirements for online disbursement.

## Contact

*   ACB branches/sub-branches in [this list](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2), or
*   24/7 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 – (028) 38 247 247 – 1800 57 77 75

## 

Overdraft

To provide loan for working capital in production and business activities

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Loans
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-borrow)
*   /Overdraft

## Benefits

*   Utilities:  
    Working capital loan by line of credit  
    Overdraft term: 12 months.
*   Proactivity over your finance situation.

## Features

*   Flexible  
    Allowing customers to spend more than the available balance on their VND deposit account
*   Automatic  
    Automatic principal collection occurs as soon as the business's deposit account has credit balance.
*   Simple  
    Credit is granted based on cash flow. Reduce documents and disbursement procedures for normal loans for quick and timely payment.
*   Repayment plan  
    Interest payment: periodically on the 15th of every month  
    Principal payment: The system automatically collects debt at the end of the working day if the current account has a credit balance and the overdraft account has a debit balance

## Eligible customers

Businesses (excluding sole proprietorship) established and operating in accordance with Vietnamese laws

## Contact

*   ACB branches/sub-branches in [this list,](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2) or
*   24/7 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 – (028) 38 247 247 – 1800 57 77 75

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/9gn5bqvUA3glPImhrXfpdU50VJlI9nS8tcbtx7tV.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## Mở tài khoản trực tuyến để trải nghiệm nhiều tiện ích dành cho Doanh nghiệp

Sở hữu ngay tài khoản thanh toán Doanh nghiệp mà không cần đến trực tiếp tại quầy. Nhận ngay ưu đãi không phí và nhiều tiện ích giúp khách hàng tối ưu hiệu quả kinh doanh

## Benefits

*   NO charge on online account transactions
*   "Double offers" for new customers: No charge for transactions at the counter and some other incentives.

## Features

*   The following charges for online transactions are WAIVED for the program “ZERO-FEE ACB”

Registration fee and annual fee

Payroll payment service or bulk payment

Online transfer inside or outside ACB network

Registration fee for additional authentication method

ACB Safekey registration and usage fee (basic and advanced)

Fee for receiving information about international payment transactions

Cash tally fee

Online balance confirmation fee

Preferential interest rates for online term deposits.

*   FREE/ADDITIONAL OFFER for up to 12 months with the "DOUBLE OFFERS" program  
    \* The following charges on account services are WAIVED at the counter:

Account opening with a nice account number or account number of choice

Opening and management fees for current accounts VND and USD account transaction fee at the counter (\*)

Payroll payment fee

The fee payables on the current accounts that have ceased transaction for 18 months or more.

*   OFFERS for other charges:

Preferential exchange rate of 10 VND (per USD) and equivalent in other foreign currencies for forex services over the counter compared to the quoted exchange rate.

Free first T/T payment via ACB ONE BIZ

Waived Visa Debit card annual fee for the first year

Free POS installation.

## Eligible customers:

*   Businesses signing ACB ONE BIZ or ACB ONE PRO contract.
*   Conditions for new corporate customers applying for "DOUBLE OFFERS": Register or use additional ACB products and services.

## Contact

*   ACB branches/sub-branches in [this list](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2), or
*   24/7 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 – (028) 38 247 247 – 1800 57 77 75

| **COMBO** | Approach | Foundation | Departure | Innovation |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Maintenance requirements |     | Clients maintain a quarterly average account balance of VND 40 million per month or more. | Clients maintain a quarterly average account balance of VND 80 million per month or more. | Clients maintain a quarterly average account balance of VND 100 million per month or more. |
| Corporate account services | 30% off transfer fees for transactions at the counter outside ACB network and for foreign currency account transactions | 40% off transfer fees for transactions at the counter outside ACB network and for foreign currency account transactions | 50% off transfer fees for transactions at the counter outside ACB network and for foreign currency account transactions | Free transfer fees for transactions at the counter outside ACB network and for foreign currency account transactions |
|     | Free various other transactions (\*) | Free various other transactions (\*) | Free various other transactions (\*) | Free various other transactions (\*) |
| Online banking transactions | Free of charge | Free of charge | Free of charge | Free of charge |
| Guarantee |     | Up to 30% discount on issuance fee | Up to 40% discount on issuance fee | Up to 50% discount on issuance fee |
| International payment (if customers do not buy a separate international payment package) |     | Credit notification free of charge | Credit notification free of charge | Credit notification free of charge |
|     |     | 30% off on international payment fees | 40% off on international payment fees | 50% off on international payment fees |
| **POS** |     | Traditional POS transactional fees: |     |     |
|     |     | 1.4% to 1.6% for international cards issued by domestic banks |     |     |
|     |     | 2% to 2.2% for international cards issued by foreign banks |     |     |
|     |     | Napas cards: 0.22% |     |     |
| **Time deposits** | Applicable for 1M–12M term. Rates applied are specified in the schedule of fees plus 0.2%/year (for transactions at counter) |     |     |     |
| **Debit cards** | First-time card issuance free of charge and first-year annual fee waived |     |     |     |
| **Credit cards** | First-time card issuance free of charge and first-year annual fee waived |     |     |     |
| **Exchange rate** | Spot: OFFER UP TO 90% OF PROFIT MARGIN (applicable for 6 months from the transaction date; new policy will be noticed after that point of time). |     |     |     |
| **OFFERS FOR LEADERSHIP, EMPLOYEES OF THE COMPANY (\*\*)** |     |     |     |     |

| Offers on employee current account service |     |     |     |     |

| Credit card offers, preferential insurance premiums |     |     |     |     |

markdown:
## Introduction

Businesses paying fees for T/T transfer of a specific total transfer amount can enjoy the following incentives:

*   No additional transfer fees.
*    No additional telegram charges.
*   Unlimited number of transfer orders.

Applicable for transactions with total transfer amount not exceeding the volume of the registered package

## Customers can choose from one or a combination of the following packages

|     |     |     |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **No.** | **PACKAGE NAME** | **USD OR EQUIVALENT** |
| 1   | PACK100 | 100,000 |
| 2   | PACK200 | 200,000 |
| 3   | PACK500 | 500,000 |
| 4   | PACK1000 | 1,000,000 |
| 5   | PACK2000 | 2,000,000 |
| 6   | PACK5000 | 5,000,000 |

Thời hạn của Gói phí: 03 tháng/ 06 tháng/ 12 tháng 

## Benefits

*   Discounts on money transfer and telegraphic message fees.
*   Deliberate choice of packages with suitable transfer volume.
*   Applicable to transactions both at the counter and via online.
*   Applicable to multiple payment currencies.
*   Professional and enthusiastic staff.

Register for consultation
