![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/6ralHE0QLUItsVzhRZCPMxZQmdZIwevIYkCEJEpF.jpg&w=3840&q=80)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/O7IuA05c6koqP0bJebnpd9nPWPNag9JtyD0qKImm.jpg&w=3840&q=80)

## 

ACB Employee Banking

Reaching further – fee waived infinitely when paying or receiving salary through ACB

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Solution package
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-solution-package)
*   /ACB Employee Banking

## Features

###### Offers for Business

Simple and effective salary payment; Pay salary online 24/7 & free

###### Incentives for corporate employees

Open an account on the spot; Free account management & money transfer fees; Enjoy preferential treatment when opening ACB card & loan/insurance service

## Business Benefits & Corporate Employees

###### Doanh nghiệpBusiness

Products & services:

1.  Business payment account
2.  Payroll service

Benefit:

*   Cost savings
*   Manage and execute payroll in a simple, efficient way & reduce operating costs
*   Simple and flexible procedure with 2 payment methods: at the counter & online
*   Convenient transactions at all ACB branches/transaction offices and 15,000 ATMs nationwide
*   Wide range of solutions for other financial needs with comprehensive offers

Increase benefits for employees through incentives from the bank

###### Employee of the enterprise

Products & Services:

*   Payment account
*   Debit card (ATM card or international debit card) linking payment accounts, credit cards
*   Life and health insurance
*   Mortgage loan, mortgage

Benefit:

*   Open salary account on site
*   Outstanding incentives and utilities when paying, transferring
*   Fully met for financial needs quickly

Enjoy preferential interest rates and fees as announced by ACB from time to time

## 5 simple steps to register to participate

###### Step 1

Register to open a Business account & register for the Financial Services package for Vietnamese Human Resources

###### Step 2

ACB staff come to the Enterprise to consult & collect the account opening documents of the Company's employees or Enterprises to provide Employee information to open an account

###### Step 3

After opening an Account and Registering for the service, ACB staff hand over the account & card to the Employee

###### Step 4

Pay period:

*   Enterprises actively implement through ACB Online/ACB Business Banking
*   Provide documents as agreed for ACB to pay salary

###### Step 5

Employees receive salary into personal account as soon as business account is successfully debited

Note: Policy is subject to change from time to time

## Contact

Contact Center 24/7: 1900 545486- (028) 38247 247

Dedicated customer care team at the nearest ACB branch/transaction office

## 

Registration for consultation

## 

Consignment-backed financing

Financing import to serve customer’s production, secured by the consignments

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Trade finance
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-trade-finance)
*   /Consignment-backed financing

## Benefits

*   Access to funds for import of goods/services
*   The consignments are the collateral
    *   Customer can repay debt and release collaterals multiple times during lending term

## Features

*   **Wide range of consigned goods:**  
    Plastic pellets, steel, raw materials for animal feed, finished vehicles.
*   **High loan to value ratio:**  
    Up to 80% of consignment value
*   **Applicable to many payment terms:**  
    Financing is applicable to the following payment terms: L/C, after-shipment T/T, D/P, after-shipment domestic bank transfer
*   **Loan term:**   
    Up to 6 months
*   **Currency:**   
    VND

## Eligible businesses

Businesses establishing and operating under the laws of Vietnam, excluding sole proprietorship.

## Contact

*   Nearest branches/sub-branches, [list here](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2)
*   247 Contact Center at phone number 1900 54 54 86 - (028) 38 247 247-1800 57 77 75

markdown:
## Benefits

*   Businesses can access fund for production of goods for export
*   Businesses are considered for clean discount/ loan

## Features

*   Loan term  
    According to contract term/customer’s cash flow
*   Currencies  
    USD, VND
*   Type of credit:  
    Revolving/Non-revolving
*   Applicability  
    Applicable to the following payment term: L/C, D/P, D/A, T/T, CAD

**Financing ratio**  
Up to 95% value of export contract or 98% value of export L/C

## Eligible businesses

*   Businesses exporting own production and earning payment in foreign currencies.
*   With demand of working capital for production of exported goods
*   Businesses must present export contract/export L/C

## Contact

*   Nearest branches/sub-branches, [list here](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2)
*   247 Contact Center at phone number 1900 54 54 86 - (028) 38 247 247-1800 57 77 75

## 

After delivery export financing

ACB financing the exporter after the exporter has shipped the consignment but before the importer makes payment

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Trade finance
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-trade-finance)
*   /After delivery export financing

## Benefits

*   Businesses can access fund while waiting for payment from importers
*   Businesses are considered for clean discount/loan

## Features

*   **Currencies**  
    VND, USD
*   **Type of credit**  
    Revolving/Non-revolving
*   **Contract’s payment term**  
    Applicable to the following payment term: L/C, D/P, D/A, T/T, CAD
*   **Financing ratio**  
    Up to 100% value of draft/bill of exchange/export documents
*   **Quick document processing time:** 2 hours

## Eligible businesses

Businesses exporting own production and earning payment in foreign currencies with demand of working capital for production

## Contact

*   Nearest branches/sub-branches, list here
*   247 Contact Center at phone number 1900 54 54 86 - (028) 38 247 247-1800 57 77 75

## Mở tài khoản trực tuyến để trải nghiệm nhiều tiện ích dành cho Doanh nghiệp

Sở hữu ngay tài khoản thanh toán Doanh nghiệp mà không cần đến trực tiếp tại quầy. Nhận ngay ưu đãi không phí và nhiều tiện ích giúp khách hàng tối ưu hiệu quả kinh doanh

## Benefits

*   Free one-time or automatic bill payment
*   Simple operation

## 

Collection service

A service provided to businesses wishing to quickly and accurately collect money from buyers through ACB's collection channels.

Sở hữu ngay tài khoản thanh toán Doanh nghiệp mà không cần đến trực tiếp tại quầy. Nhận ngay ưu đãi không phí và nhiều tiện ích giúp khách hàng tối ưu hiệu quả kinh doanh

## Benefits

*   Avoid the risk of transporting cash.
*   Fully utilize your capital.
*   Manage receivables better, collect revenue quickly
*   Simple, fast, and accurate implementation
*   Safety and security in payment transactions

## Features

*   Multiple convenient payment channels.

Electronic channel: ACB ONE BIZ/ACB ONE PRO, POS, ATM/CDM

Physical channel: at ACB counters, at a designated location

*   Automated reporting and tracking system

The collected amount shall be credited to the business’s current account at ACB as soon as the collection transaction is successful.

## 

Payment on Behalf Service

A service provided to businesses with a need to debit money from their accounts for payment to designated beneficiaries quickly, accurately, and safely

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Financial Services
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service)
*   /Payment on Behalf Service

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/9gn5bqvUA3glPImhrXfpdU50VJlI9nS8tcbtx7tV.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## Mở tài khoản trực tuyến để trải nghiệm nhiều tiện ích dành cho Doanh nghiệp

Sở hữu ngay tài khoản thanh toán Doanh nghiệp mà không cần đến trực tiếp tại quầy. Nhận ngay ưu đãi không phí và nhiều tiện ích giúp khách hàng tối ưu hiệu quả kinh doanh

## Benefits

*   Minimize risks from payment in cash.
*   Make payment to a large number of beneficiaries at the same time.
*   Easily monitor the payment status via ACB ONE BIZ.
*   Optimize the cost management of businesses with automatic settlement process.
*   Ensure money transfer to the right designated beneficiary.
*   Safety and security in payment transactions 

## Features

*   Payment method:

Payments to a list of beneficiaries: bulk payment service at the counter, via ACB ONE BIZ, via ACB ONE PRO 

Pay invoice/agency commissions/point-of-purchase display costs

Cash payment at the designated location

*   How it works: ACB debits money from the Company's account and transfers it to the designated beneficiary.

## Eligible customers

*   Customers having current accounts at ACB.

## Tham khảo biểu phí doanh nghiêp·

## References

Service contract for collection and payment

Framework contract for service provision

*   247 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 - (028) 38 247 247 - 1800 57 77 75

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/9mb1td4GdkmWFoJnrlgGq0rJYxMvs7pSE3hEDNQ3.jpg&w=3840&q=80)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/WyPB2ybWacA0uFDLFg5rBI0nYpgJgXg7vkPcimNm.jpg&w=3840&q=80)

## 

Electronically signed transactions

A banking service allowing transactions via email with the required documents signed electronically. ACB will perform the transaction for businesses rather than the businesses go to the counter to perform the transaction as in the traditional way.

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Financial Services
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service)
*   /Electronically signed transactions

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/9gn5bqvUA3glPImhrXfpdU50VJlI9nS8tcbtx7tV.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## Mở tài khoản trực tuyến để trải nghiệm nhiều tiện ích dành cho Doanh nghiệp

Sở hữu ngay tài khoản thanh toán Doanh nghiệp mà không cần đến trực tiếp tại quầy. Nhận ngay ưu đãi không phí và nhiều tiện ích giúp khách hàng tối ưu hiệu quả kinh doanh

## Benefits

*   Actively and flexibly choose the suitable means to perform transaction.
*   Save on travel costs and transaction time
*   Safety and security in payment transactions.

## Features

*   How it works: businesses conduct transactions through documents signed with electronic signatures provided by providers accepted by ACB and sent to ACB via email.
*   Procedure:   
    After signing an electronic signature contract, customer performs the following steps:   
    1\. Prepare digital documents using ACB’s forms.   
    2\. Convert the documents to PDF files.  
    3\. Sign PDF files with electronic signature(s)  
    4\. Send documents to ACB.

## Eligible customers

*   Businesses owning electronic signatures provided by providers accepted by ACB.

## Contact

*   Nearest ACB branch/sub-branch or make an appointment online, [here](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2)
*   247 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 - (028) 38 247 247 - 1800 57 77 75

A banking service allowing transactions via email with the required documents signed electronically. ACB will perform the transaction for businesses rather than the businesses go to the counter to perform the transaction as in the traditional way.
Home
/ 
Business - Financial Services
/Electronically signed transactions
Mở tài khoản trực tuyến để trải nghiệm nhiều tiện ích dành cho Doanh nghiệp
Sở hữu ngay tài khoản thanh toán Doanh nghiệp mà không cần đến trực tiếp tại quầy. Nhận ngay ưu đãi không phí và nhiều tiện ích giúp khách hàng tối ưu hiệu quả kinh doanh
Benefits
Actively and flexibly choose the suitable means to perform transaction.
Save on travel costs and transaction time
Safety and security in payment transactions.
Features
How it works: businesses conduct transactions through documents signed with electronic signatures provided by providers accepted by ACB and sent to ACB via email.
Procedure: 
After signing an electronic signature contract, customer performs the following steps: 
1. Prepare digital documents using ACB’s forms. 
2. Convert the documents to PDF files.
3. Sign PDF files with electronic signature(s)
4. Send documents to ACB.
Eligible customers
Businesses owning electronic signatures provided by providers accepted by ACB.
Contact
Nearest ACB branch/sub-branch or make an appointment online, here
247 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 - (028) 38 247 247 - 1800 57 77 75
Register for consultation

## 

Transaction via fax

Customers can save costs and travel time when transacting with ACB by sending documents via fax.

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Financial Services
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service)

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/9gn5bqvUA3glPImhrXfpdU50VJlI9nS8tcbtx7tV.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## Mở tài khoản trực tuyến để trải nghiệm nhiều tiện ích dành cho Doanh nghiệp

Sở hữu ngay tài khoản thanh toán Doanh nghiệp mà không cần đến trực tiếp tại quầy. Nhận ngay ưu đãi không phí và nhiều tiện ích giúp khách hàng tối ưu hiệu quả kinh doanh

## Benefits

*   Saving transaction time
*   Convenience for businesses located far away from ACB
*   Satisfying the needs of businesses for immediate transactions
*   Safety and security in payment transactions

## Features

*   Types of services accepted for performing via fax:  
    Deposits  
    Financial services  
    International payment  
    Foreign currency trading  
    Credits
*   Original copy of documents can be supplemented later.

## Eligible customers

*   Businesses opening corporate current accounts at ACB.

## References

Tham khảo biểu phí khách hàng doanh nghiệp

## Contact

*   Nearest ACB branch/sub-branch or make an appointment online, [here](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2)
*   247 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 - (028) 38 247 247 - 1800 57 77 75

## 

Centralized account management

A service that provides the feature of capital concentration or capital allocation between a main account and multiple sub-accounts, helping businesses to concentrate or allocate capital efficiently and automatically.

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Financial Services
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service)
*   /Centralized account management

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/9gn5bqvUA3glPImhrXfpdU50VJlI9nS8tcbtx7tV.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## Mở tài khoản trực tuyến để trải nghiệm nhiều tiện ích dành cho Doanh nghiệp

Sở hữu ngay tài khoản thanh toán Doanh nghiệp mà không cần đến trực tiếp tại quầy. Nhận ngay ưu đãi không phí và nhiều tiện ích giúp khách hàng tối ưu hiệu quả kinh doanh

## Benefits

*   Effectively control multiple individual cash flows
*   You only need to schedule one time to concentrate or allocate capital.
*   Maximize the return on capital
*   Reducing procedures, management costs, and administrative costs of the business

## Features

*   Concentrating capital from multiple sub-accounts into one main account or replenishing capital from the main account for sub-accounts.
*   Multiple principles of capital allocation or capital concentration can be specified and are fully automated by the system.

## Eligible customers

*   Customers with main accounts and sub accounts at ACB.

## Tham khảo biểu phí khách hàng doanh nghiệp

## References

Centralized account management service contract

## Contact

*   Nearest ACB branch/sub-branch or make an appointment online, [here](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2)
*   247 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 - (028) 38 247 247 - 1800 57 77 75

## 

Register for consultation

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/1wyKrdLMpX7yd3reb65ZrWsh6bQc15OHIeJcHYtt.jpg&w=3840&q=80)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/FrzHb5i0Deh6NudiRd0EjOHcGT42gqXXpEXmwtld.jpg&w=3840&q=80)

## 

Custody Service

Is a service that ACB receives and preserves valuable papers and documents for businesses to ensure the safety and confidentiality of information.

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Financial Services
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service)
*   /Custody Service

## Benefits

*   Limit the risk of theft of important papers and documents.
*   Information is kept safe and confidential completely.
*   Reduce the administrative and management costs of the businesses. 

## Features

*   Items to be in custody: important papers and documents of the Business.
*   Custody fee:  
    Calculated on a basis of a full month.   
    In case where the custody period is less than 30 days, it will be counted as 1 month.   
    Fees are applied according to the applicable regulations of ACB from time to time
*   Margin requirements: 2,000,000 VND/custody service contract 

## References

Fee schedule for corporate customers.

## Contact

*   Nearest ACB branch/sub-branch or make an appointment online, [here](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2)
*   247 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 - (028) 38 247 247 - 1800 57 77 75

## 

Register consultation

markdown:
![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/Xpro57QInFEBIIA6BH8KbwoIyWmTrRnbQdlx2QpZ.jpg&w=3840&q=80)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/WMAJo4UVpeikRLEiddPQgVKiNFdx7jIju265gg59.jpg&w=3840&q=80)

## 

Payment Authorization

A service where ACB acts as an intermediary in ensuring payment for goods and services between parties.

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Financial Services
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-finance-service)
*   /Payment Authorization

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/9gn5bqvUA3glPImhrXfpdU50VJlI9nS8tcbtx7tV.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## Mở tài khoản trực tuyến để trải nghiệm nhiều tiện ích dành cho Doanh nghiệp

Sở hữu ngay tài khoản thanh toán Doanh nghiệp mà không cần đến trực tiếp tại quầy. Nhận ngay ưu đãi không phí và nhiều tiện ích giúp khách hàng tối ưu hiệu quả kinh doanh

## Benefits

*   Ensure the interests of both the obligor and the beneficiary. The obligor/the beneficiary receives enough assets as agreed in the contract.

## Features

*   Procedures:   
    1\. The obligor, the beneficiary, and ACB sign the Payment authorization contract.   
    2\. The obligor places an escrow deposit at ACB to secure future payment.   
    3\. ACB makes payment according to the terms of the contract.   
    4\. Upon termination of the service, ACB liquidates the Payment authorization contract and returns the remaining escrow deposit amount to the obligor (if any).

## Eligible customers

*   Businesses that are obligors having current accounts at ACB.

## References

Tham khảo biểu phí khách hàng doanh nghiệp

## Contact

*   Nearest ACB branch/sub-branch or make an appointment online, [here](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2)
*   247 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 - (028) 38 247 247 - 1800 57 77 75

##

markdown:
![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/2lG9JvUarYGDFrQ1z0Fv2vhLu4OP6Diahy2Xiy2i.jpg&w=3840&q=80)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/2lG9JvUarYGDFrQ1z0Fv2vhLu4OP6Diahy2Xiy2i.jpg&w=3840&q=80)

From November 1, 2022(\*), the ACB Visa Business Card duo offers the privilege of 1% REFUND for all spending transactions: equipment purchases, travel expenses,... . An effective financial assistant to support businesses in professional spending management. Light burden for all monthly expenses of the Enterprise.

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Promotion - Business
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/promotion-business)
*   /Business VISA card, effective spending solution

## Features

###### Cashback up to 120 million/year (\*)

Cashback 1% for all spending transactions via ACB Visa Corporate card up to 120 million/business/year

###### Automatic monthly refund

The refund amount is automatically transferred monthly to the payment account linked to the customer's debit or credit card account.

###### Free annual fee for the first year

Free annual fee for the first year when opening a new ACB Visa Business card

## Special privileges

Cashback 1% for all spending transactions via ACB Visa Corporate card:

Cashback up to 1,000,000 VND/month/card, minimum 100,000 VND/month/card.  
Maximum refund for credit card is: 10,000,000 VND/business/month, and  
Maximum refund for debit card is: 10,000,000 VND/business/month

The refund amount is automatically transferred monthly to the payment account linked to the customer's debit or credit card account.

Free annual fee for the first year when opening a new ACB Visa Corporate debit/credit card from January 31, 2023

## Applicable card

All valid Visa Corporate Credit and Visa Business Debit cards issued by ACB

## Time and area of application

(\*) Program time:

Apply Cashback for Visa Corporate Credit credit cards: From November 1, 2022 to the end of November 30, 2023.

Apply Cashback for Visa Business Debit Card: From December 1, 2022 to the end of November 30, 2023 (Only for HCMC area, applied from December 15, 2022)

Apply nationwide

## Program Rules and Regulations

Applicable to all existing cards and new cards opened during the program implementation.

## See program details here

Visa Business Debit Card Program Details

Program details about Visa Corporate Credit credit card

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/N891wQEZrpRlkVc1W1RQJyDqrPYBP9qlfpm61jCp.jpg&w=3840&q=80)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/KTujmKnhDKQ1VgBdjGKVOb1tCV5K7DH6reinwNUW.jpg&w=3840&q=80)

A deposit product on ACB ONE BIZ, clients can proactively open new accounts/close them off anytime, anywhere, without the need to visit ACB’s branch/sub-branch.

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Save
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-save)
*   /Deposits your money on ACB ONE BIZ

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/9gn5bqvUA3glPImhrXfpdU50VJlI9nS8tcbtx7tV.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## Open a corporate current account online to experience multiple benefits.

Instantly own a corporate current account without the need to visit ACB branch/sub-branch. Instantly receive zero-fee offers and various utilities to help optimize the efficiency of your business.

## Benefits

*   Enjoy higher deposit rates than at the counter. 
*   Round the clock 247 open and early termination for online deposits.
*   Various deposit tenors to choose from.
*   Could be terminated early when there is an unexpected need. 
*   Deposit information are secured.

## Features

*   Currency: VND.
*   Minimum deposit amount: 1,000,000 VND.
*   Tenor: Standard tenor (from 1 week to 36 months) and flexible by days (from
*   31 days to 1079 days).
*   Interest payment method: At the end of the tenor.
*   Interest rates: According to the product regulations.

## Requirements/Conditions:

*   Clients open a payment account at ACB and register to use ACB ONE BIZ to be able to make online deposit transactions.
*   Vietnamese or foreign organizations established and operating in accordance with Vietnamese law or according to the laws of the country where such organizations are established.

## Tài liệu khách hàng cần tham khảo

Coporate deposit interest rate board

## Contact

*   ACB branches/sub-branches in [this list](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2), or
*   24/7 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 – (028) 38 247 247 – 1800 57 77 75

## 

Register for consultation

A term deposit product for corporates whose maturity date is a specific date in the future.

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Business - Save
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/business-save)
*   /Term deposit with specific maturity date at choice

![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/9gn5bqvUA3glPImhrXfpdU50VJlI9nS8tcbtx7tV.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## Open a corporate current account online to experience multiple benefits.

Instantly own a corporate current account without the need to visit ACB branch/sub-branch. Instantly receive zero-fee offers and various utilities to help optimize the efficiency of your business.

## Benefits

*   Flexible and proactive in choosing the deposit period corresponding to the financial plan.
*   Interest is calculated according to the actual number of deposit days. 
*   Free choice of channel: ACB ONE BIZ or at the counter.
*   Flexibility to withdraw partially before maturity. 
*   Deposit information security. 
*   Simple, convenient, and fast procedure.

## Features

*   Currency: VND 
*   Minimum deposit amount: 1,000,000 VND. 
*   Tenor: choose a tenor according to a certain number of days (7 days or more). 
*   Interest payment method: Fixed periodic interest payment at the end of the tenor. 
*   Interest calculation basis: The actual number of deposit days.
*   Transaction channel: ACB ONE BIZ or at the counter.
*   Flexibility to withdraw partially before maturity   
    *   Term of application: 1 month or more 
    *   Partial principal withdrawal amount: Minimum 1,000,000 VND, maximum: 70% of the original deposit principal.
    *   Each account can be withdrawn up to twice a day.

## Requirements/Conditions:

*   Clients opening a payment account at ACB. 
*   Register for ACB One Biz if they need to make online deposit transactions.
*   Vietnamese or foreign organizations established and operating in accordance with Vietnamese law or according to the laws of the country where such organizations are established.

## References

Coporate deposit interest rate board

Application form for transaction

## Contact

*   ACB branches/sub-branches in [this list](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2), or
*   24/7 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 – (028) 38 247 247 – 1800 57 77 75

## Open a corporate current account online to experience multiple benefits.

Instantly own a corporate current account without the need to visit ACB branch/sub-branch. Instantly receive zero-fee offers and various utilities to help optimize the efficiency of your business.

## Benefits

*   Various deposit tenors to choose from. 
*    Have the flexibility to partially withdraw before maturity. 
*   Receive interest payments at ACB or any bank. 
*   Enjoy attractive interest rates. 
*   Deposit information security.
*   Simple, convenient, and fast procedure.

## Features

*   Currency: VND, USD, JPY. 
*   Minimum deposit amount: 1,000,000 VND/ 100 USD/ 100,000 JPY. 
*   Tenor:   
    VND: from 1 week to 36 months   
    USD: from 1 week to 12 months   
    JPY: from 1 month to 12 months 
*   Interest payment method: Interest is paid at the end of the deposit term. 
*   Have the flexibility to partially withdraw before maturity   
    Applicable currency: VND   
    Applicable tenor: 1 month or more   
    Partial principal withdrawal amount: minimum 1,000,000 VND, maximum: 70% of the original deposit principal.  
    Each account can be withdrawn up to two times a day. 

## Requirements/Conditions:

*   Vietnamese or foreign organizations established and operating in accordance with Vietnamese law or according to the laws of the country where such organizations are established.

## References

Coporate deposit interest rate board

Application form for transaction

*   ACB branches/sub-branches in [this list,](https://acb.com.vn/lien-he?tab=2) or
*   24/7 Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 – (028) 38 247 247 – 1800 57 77 75

**Pursuant to:**

_\- Circular No. 21/2013/TT-NHNN dated September 09, 2013 of the Governor of the State Bank of Vietnam on promulgating the Regulations on the operational network of commercial banks;_ 

_\- Circular No. 01/2022/TT-NHNN dated January 28, 2022 amending and supplementing some articles of Circular No. 21/2013/TT-NHNN dated 09/9/2013 of the Governor of the State Bank of Vietnam on promulgating the Regulations on the operational network of commercial banks;_

_\- Legal Document No. 897/HCM-TTr3 dated April 02, 2024 of the State Bank of Vietnam-Ho Chi Minh City Branch on relocating Binh Thanh Branch;_

Asia Commercial Bank is pleased to announce that Binh Thanh Branch shall be relocated due to the change of house number according to the announcement of the People’s Committee of Binh Thanh District, as follows: 

**\- Current address:** No. 71, Dien Bien Phu Street, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City

**\- New address:** No. 63A, Dien Bien Phu Street, Binh Thanh District, Ward 15, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City

Yours faithfully,

markdown:
![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/uwT8BKudI1wMy9406M7T89yjBaMkR6bIaXptI5NF.png&w=3840&q=80)![ACB](https://acb.com.vn/_next/image?url=/media/gWXCrLGWZcvg7nz3ck79v6CnjoMJXxCopfF721RT.png&w=3840&q=80)

And receive a gift set valuing VND 800,000 when linking ACB account up with Momo for the first time.

*   [
    
    Home
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en)
*   /[
    
    Promotion - Digital Banking
    
    ](https://acb.com.vn/en/promotion-digital-banking)
*   /Open and link ACB online account right on MOMO app

## Features

###### Open ACB account online and link it up with Momo.

Free of charge, simple and fast processing.

###### A gift set valuing VND 800,000.

Applicable to clients who link their ACB account up with Momo for the first time.

###### Program duration

From now until 31.12.2023

## Program details

A gift set valuing VND 800,000.

Applicable to: Momo accounts that have not been linked up with any bank account before and ACB accounts that have not been linked up with any Momo account before.

Clients enter “MOMOACB”, link up with a bank account and transfer at least VND 10,000 from the bank account that has just been linked up with to Momo account.

A gift set includes:

Vouchers that are used to pay for any services.

Vouchers that are used for mobile top-up and (3G, 4G)data top-up.

Vouchers that are used to pay on Google Play/App Store, pay bills, pay for goods/services on BAEMIN.

Vouchers that are used to buy airplane tickets, movie tickets, food and beverage, coffee, milk tea, goods at convenient stores and supermarkets.

Vouchers that are used to pay for insurance and repay consumer loans, etc.

## How to open ACB account online on Momo platform

**Step 1:** Open Momo app, search “Open a bank account” from the search section at the home screen.

**Step 2:** In the list of banks, search “ACB” and select “Open an account free of charge”.

**Step 3:** Take pictures of personal papers and the face as guided.

**Step 4:** Fill contact information.

**Step 5:** Enter OTP and wait for the confirmation of successful account opening.

**(\*) Eligible clients:**

*   Clients who have not opened ACB account yet.

## Contact

Should you have any inquiries about the program, please contact any of our offices or 24/7Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 - (028) 38 247 247.

A gift set valuing VND 800,000.
Applicable to: Momo accounts that have not been linked up with any bank account before and ACB accounts that have not been linked up with any Momo account before.
Clients enter “MOMOACB”, link up with a bank account and transfer at least VND 10,000 from the bank account that has just been linked up with to Momo account.
A gift set includes:
Vouchers that are used to pay for any services.
Vouchers that are used for mobile top-up and (3G, 4G)data top-up.
Vouchers that are used to pay on Google Play/App Store, pay bills, pay for goods/services on BAEMIN.
Vouchers that are used to buy airplane tickets, movie tickets, food and beverage, coffee, milk tea, goods at convenient stores and supermarkets.
Vouchers that are used to pay for insurance and repay consumer loans, etc.
How to open ACB account online on Momo platform
Step 1: Open Momo app, search “Open a bank account” from the search section at the home screen.
Step 2: In the list of banks, search “ACB” and select “Open an account free of charge”.
Step 3: Take pictures of personal papers and the face as guided.
Step 4: Fill contact information.
Step 5: Enter OTP and wait for the confirmation of successful account opening.
(*) Eligible clients:
Clients who have not opened ACB account yet.
Contact
Should you have any inquiries about the program, please contact any of our offices or 24/7Contact Center at 1900 54 54 86 - (028) 38 247 247.

markdown: From November 1, 2022(\*), the ACB Visa Business Card duo offers the privilege of 1% REFUND for all spending transactions: equipment purchases, travel expenses,... . An effective financial assistant to support businesses in professional spending management. Light burden for all monthly expenses of the Enterprise.
